Question
========
True or false? If an object is in equilibrium (i.e. all the forces on it are 
balanced), then the object must be at rest.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False


Solution
========
False. An object in equilibrium must have zero acceleration, but its velocity is
not necessarily zero.
